txt.en: The fleeing Orcs are dead, but the glow-worms that slew them are a threat to the Elves
Defeated pestilent glow-worms in the Hall of Lights ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeated the glow-worm queen in the Hall of Lights
Alfirimbes has told you that a company of Orcs fleeing from Dol Guldur was spotted entering a cavern in the Mirk-eaves.

'We have victory for a short time, [placeholder], and until the army from the East arrives, we must make the most of it.

'A company of Orcs fled from the assault upon Dol Guldur, and scouts tracked them from a distance until they entered a cavern here in the Mirk-eaves. I fear what evils they may be up to inside the tunnels there.

'Enter this cavern and find out what the Orcs are up to, [placeholder]. Defeat them once you do...and any other dangers that lurk within!'
Orcs fleeing from Dol Guldur have taken refuge in a cavern in the Mirk-eaves.\n\nAlfirimbes has asked you to find the fleeing Orcs in the Mirk-eaves cave and to put an end to the threat they pose.

'Thank you for cleansing the Hall of Lights of the glow-worm infestation, [placeholder]. That they disposed of the fleeing Orcs for us is a boon, but they still posed a threat to Echad Sirion. Our safety here was in jeopardy, and that must be our primary concern.'
Pestilent glow-worms and their queens can be found throughout the Hall of Lights.\n\nThe fleeing Orcs have been slain by the pestilent glow-worms in the Hall of Lights.
Alfirimbes is waiting to speak with you in Echad Sirion.\n\nYou have cleansed the Hall of Lights of the dangerous glow-worm infestation and should return to Alfirimbes with the news.
'The Orcs entered a cave here in the Mirk-eaves and surely seek to effect some evil. Follow them and put an end to their schemes!'
'It is good to know that the Orcs have run afoul of danger, but the glow-worms are a threat to us as well! Return to the Hall of Lights and cleanse the cavern of them, [placeholder]!'
'Orcs that fled from Dol Guldur ran afoul of trouble in the Hall of Lights.'
Find the fleeing Orcs in the Mirk-eaves cavern
'Glow-worms in the Hall of Lights are dangerous in large numbers.'
Defeat pestilent glow-worms in the Hall of Lights ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat the glow-worm queen in the Hall of Lights
Talk to Alfirimbes at Echad Sirion
